entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 02:18 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 8 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 8 with temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 02:18 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 02:18 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
